job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Keap liberates and empowers entrepreneurs to strengthen families, communities and economies. Our leading Sales and Marketing Automation platform is built on 20 years of experience working with over 200,000 entrepreneurs to grow sales and save time in the process. We're growing fast and have big goals. As a at Keap, you will apply statistical methods to solve problems, improve decision making, and help our business grow. This includes defining business problems, wrangling relevant data, feature engineering, developing models, productionizing models, monitoring model performance, and sharing findings with our business partners. The Data Science & Analytics team works closely with multiple teams across Keap. We build systems to ensure accurate reporting and provide useful analysis to our business stakeholders. We also support experiments across the company and build data products, including predictive models that are used for decision making. This position is located at our Chandler, AZ office at 1260 South Spectrum Blvd. Chandler AZ 85286
